Welcome to Anki’s documentation!¶

This repo contains the documentation of source code for the computer version of Anki. you can check for writing addons documentation also for more help. For data base documentation you can check AnkiDorid.

Note: This unofficial documentation generated by sphinx python module, don’t hesitated to contribute to it to improve the this documentation.
